name: Necro Night
description:
______________________________________________________________________________________

CONTAINS MILD FLASHING LIGHTS

This game was created for Miziziziz's Four Game Devs, One Art Kit series. The majority of art assets used in the project come from this Modern Interiors tile set, and the game was made in roughly 48 hours. It's about killing people by writing their names in a book.

______________________________________________________________________________________

CONTROLS:

Type Names - Keyboard

Move - Mouse

______________________________________________________________________________________

CREDITS:

Created By: Bryce Bucher

Modern Interiors By: LimeZu
